content: Just as the inscriptions on the Rosetta Stone point to the activity of an ancient scribe and a computer program points to a programmer, I have argued that the digital code discovered within the DNA molecule suggests the activity of a designing mind at the origin of life.
translations: ita:Proprio come le iscrizioni sulla Stele di Rosetta indicano l'attivit√† di un antico scriba e un programma per computer in
